hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) as saying: When a servant (of Allah) is placed in his grave, and his Companions depart from him, he hears the stepping sound of their shoes

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَشْىِ فِي النَّعْلِ بَيْنَ الْقُبُورِ
chapter.eng-name: Walking Between Graves While Wearing Shoes
